import HomepageHeading from '../HomePageHeading/HomepageHeading'; import getWidth from '../ContainerWidth/GetWidth' import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HeaderPart from '../../../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart'; import got from '../../../Images/got.png'; import ghost from '../../../Images/ghost.png'; import '../../../NewOne/Appp.css'; import vk from '../../../Images/vk.png'; import narcos from '../../../Images/narcos.png'; import MovieInfo from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/MovieInfo' import { getQueriesForElement } from '@testing-library/react'; import ImageOfRolePlayers from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/ImageOfRolePlayers'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import imax from '../../../Images/imax.png'; import premiere from '../../../Images/premiere.png'; import lumiere from '../../../Images/lumiere.png'; import dreamers from '../../../Images/dreamers.png'; import shaw from '../../../Images/shaw.png'; const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const OnMouseHovered = () => { setHovered(true); } const OnMouseOut = () => { setHovered(false); } const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> {/* */} {/* Home Work Company */} {/* */} Nav item Nav item again One more nav Another nav item More navigation {/* */}
Narcos

A gritty chronicle of the war against Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels.

{/* */} {/* */} {/* setStartDate(x)} /> */} {/*   */} Trends Now Poupular Promotions Showtimes Bookings
{/* {children} */} ) } export default DesktopContainer;
